titleStmt.title: A guide to eternity extracted out of the writings of the Holy Fathers and ancient philosophers / written originally in Latine by John Bona ; and now done into English by Roger L'Estrange, Esq.
Manductio ad coelum. English
titleStmt.author: Bona, Giovanni, 1609-1674.
L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

notesStmt.note: Added engraved t.p. by F.H. van Hove.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
